title: Ashampoo ClipFinder HD 2.13 [ML]
description:
Ashampoo ClipFinder HD 2.13 [ML]

===========
::English::
===========

Language: Multi
Platform: Windows All
Treatment: Complete
Developer: ashampoo.com

Ashampoo ClipFinder HD - Program for searching and downloading video files located on various video-hosting. Has a beautiful and easy to use interface, making the work with the program leaves only positive impressions. The program is able to simultaneously search videos from many sites, including YouTube and MySpace, showing details of each found video file (name, duration, screenshot, etc.). Before downloading the video anyone interested can view it in the preview window. In addition, there exists the function of downloading files on the user links. The program has a special section for collection and review the best videos, which you can add any files in the format FLV. Supported by a new visual theme, and there is a multilanguage support, including support for Russian language.

Features:
* All this is absolutely free
* Amazing 3D Video clip browser
* Download and convert in one click
* Added a Vimeo Portal (lots of HD clips)
* Search up to 15 video soon
* Search in the selected video
* HD video filter - find only HD video
* New video player with fullscreen mode
* Improved video playlist
* Search tabs, tabbed browsing
